DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , double-blinded , double-dummy , randomize control clinical trial evaluate efficacy moxibustion osteoarthritis knee .
DOC.detailed_description: Aim : To evaluate effectiveness moxibustion treatment patient osteoarthritis knee , respect relieve pain , improve dysfunction improve quality life well . Design : A multicentre , double-blinded , double-dummy , randomize control clinical study perform China . Eligible participant randomly assign moxibustion group ( real moxibustion plus placebo gel ) control group ( diclofenac sodium gel plus sham moxibustion ) 1:1 allocation ratio . Participants group receive 12 session real/sham moxibustion 4 week 3 acupoints ( ST35 , EX-LE4 , ST36 ) . Either diclofenac sodium gel placebo gel apply 4 g per knee 4 time daily 4 week . The whole study period 13 week , 1-week run-in period , 4-week treatment phase , 8-week follow-up phase . The primary outcome measure change global scale Western Ontario McMaster Universities Osteoarthritis Index ( WOMAC ) end course . The secondary outcome include change subscales ( pain , stiffness , function ) WOMAC , Visual Analogue scale ( VAS ) Patient Global Assessment ( PGA ) . Safety assess every visit .
